Geometry Curve Style
====================



```
concept {
    IfcCurveStyle:Name -> IfcLabel
    IfcCurveStyle:CurveFont -> IfcCurveStyleFont
    IfcCurveStyle:CurveWidth -> IfcPositiveRatioMeasure
    IfcCurveStyle:CurveColour -> IfcColourRgb
    IfcCurveStyle:ModelOrDraughting -> IfcBoolean
    IfcCurveStyleFont:PatternList -> IfcCurveStyleFontPattern
    IfcCurveStyleFont:Name -> IfcLabel
    IfcCurveStyleFontPattern:VisibleSegmentLength -> IfcLengthMeasure
    IfcCurveStyleFontPattern:InvisibleSegmentLength -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
}
```
